description:
Head of the acting section in the L.M.E., he was present during Kyouko`s audition and acted as one of the judges. In the anime, he was the one who assigned Kyouko, as a member of the Love Me department, to become Ren`s manager in Yashiro`s stead, who could not perform his duties due to colds.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Matsushima
